subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon, who went 18-6 for Oakland in 2013 and was named an All-Star, was said to agree to a two-year, $20 million deal with the Mets, pending a physical.
snippet: Bartolo Colon, who went 18-6 for Oakland in 2013 and was named an All-Star, was said to agree to a two-year, $20 million deal with the Mets, pending a physical.
